00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00040 
00041 #include "CmdPaste.h"
00042 #include "SceneModel.h"
00043 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00044 #include "tgf.h"
00045 
00051 CmdPaste::CmdPaste( tgc::PasteType type, const QModelIndex& parentModelIndex,  SoNode*& coinClipboard, SceneModel& sceneModel, QUndoCommand* parent )
00052 : QUndoCommand("Paste", parent), m_pasteType( type ), m_parentInstance( 0 ), m_coinChild( coinClipboard ), m_sceneModel( &sceneModel ), m_oldNodeName( "" ),  m_row( -1 )
00053 {
00054         if( !parentModelIndex.isValid() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdPaste called with invalid ModelIndex." );
00055 
00056         m_parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentModelIndex );
00057         if( !m_parentInstance-> GetNode() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdPaste NULL m_coinParent." );
00058 
00059         m_row = m_parentInstance->children.size();
00060         m_oldNodeName = QString( coinClipboard->getName().getString() );
00061 }
00062 
00066 CmdPaste::~CmdPaste()
00067 {
00068 
00069 }
00070 
00075 void CmdPaste::undo()
00076 {
00077         SoBaseKit* coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( m_parentInstance-> GetNode() );
00078         m_sceneModel->Cut( *coinParent, m_row );
00079         m_parentInstance->children[m_row]->GetNode()->unref();
00080         m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( m_coinChild, m_oldNodeName );
00081 }
00082 
00087 void CmdPaste::redo( )
00088 {
00089         SoBaseKit* coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( m_parentInstance-> GetNode() );
00090         if( !m_sceneModel->Paste( m_pasteType, *coinParent, *m_coinChild, m_row ) ) return;
00091 
00092         SoNode* newNode = m_parentInstance->children[m_row]->GetNode();
00093         newNode->ref();
00094 
00095         int count = 0;
00096         QString newName = m_oldNodeName;
00097         while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( newNode, newName ) )
00098         {
00099                 count++;
00100                 newName = QString( "%1_copy%2").arg( m_oldNodeName, QString::number( count) );
00101         }
00102 }
